defaultCards.title: WOD Attack
defaultCards.description: Professor Johnson assigns a surprise WOD to the enemy. The shock makes them skip their turn and take 25 damage.
defaultCards.funFact: Plays electric guitar in a band called Hardly Strictly Jerry.

allCards.course: ICS 496: Capstone Project, ICS 615: Software Quality and Maintenance
allCards.title: Power Up!
allCards.description: Summons a Suoer Mario Mushroom which increases the power of all other cards in the deck by +10.
allCards.funFact: Owns a functioning Nintendo Entertainment System which he keeps in his office.

allCards.funFact: Previously had ICS 211 students create a class hierachy of beer.

allCards.course: ICS 314: Software Engineering I
allCards.title: Super Shield
allCards.description: Provides a shield which absorbs 25 damage. If broken, deals 10 damage to all enemies.
allCards.funFact: Worked with Steve Jobs at a company called "NeXT Computers" after finishing graduate school. After NeXT was acquired by Apple in 1996, the NeXTStep operating system became the basis for macOS and iOS, the operating systems used in today's Apple computers and smartphones.

allCards.course: ICS 314: Software Engineering I
allCards.title: Super Shield
allCards.description: Provides a shield which absorbs 25 damage. If broken, deals 25 damage to all enemies.
allCards.funFact: Worked with Steve Jobs at a company called "NeXT Computers." After NeXT was acquired by Apple in 1996, the NeXTStep operating system became the basis for macOS and iOS, the operating systems used in today's Apple computers and smartphones.

allCards.course: ICS 314: Software Engineering I
allCards.title: Super Shield
allCards.description: Provides a shield which absorbs 25 damage. If broken, deals 50 damage to all enemies and causes the opponent to skip their turn.
allCards.funFact: Worked with Steve Jobs at a company called "NeXT Computers" after finishing graduate school. After NeXT was acquired by Apple in 1996, the NeXTStep operating system became the basis for macOS and iOS, the operating systems used in today's Apple computers and smartphones.

allCards.course: ICS 311: Algorithms, ICS 422: Network Science Methodology, ICS 622: Network Science, ICS 667: HCI Design Methods, ICS 668: Social Informatics
allCards.title: Outdoor Survival Kit
allCards.description: Prepares everyone for the tough outdoors by increasing the damage output of all cards by +10 and reducing the amount of damage taken by -10 for three turns.
allCards.funFact: In 1977, ascended the Zoroaster Temple in the Grand Canyon for the first time solo.

allCards.course: ICS 311: Algorithms, ICS 422: Network Science Methodology, ICS 622: Network Science, ICS 667: HCI Design Methods, ICS 668: Social Informatics
allCards.title: Outdoor Survival Kit
allCards.description: Prepares everyone for the tough outdoors by increasing the damage output of all cards by +25 and reducing the amount of damage taken by -25 for three turns.
allCards.funFact: In 1977, ascended the Zoroaster Temple in the Grand Canyon for the first time solo. In the early '80s, survived being buried alive in a snow drift during solo winter climb of Wind River peak in Wyoming.

allCards.course: ICS 311: Algorithms, ICS 422: Network Science Methodology, ICS 622: Network Science, ICS 667: HCI Design Methods, ICS 668: Social Informatics
allCards.title: Outdoor Survival Kit
allCards.description: Prepares everyone for the tough outdoors by increasing the damage output of all cards by +50 and reducing the amount of damage taken by -50 for three turns.
allCards.funFact: In 1977, ascended the Zoroaster Temple in the Grand Canyon for the first time solo. In the early '80s, survived being buried alive in a snow drift during solo winter climb of Wind River peak in Wyoming. Has nearly completed project of hiking every Ko'olau ridge trail to the summit from Kuli'ou'ou to Manana.

allCards.course: ICS 211: Intro to Computer Science II, ICS 313: Programming Language Theory, ICS 612: Theory of Operating Systems, ICS 651: Computer Networks
allCards.title: Sailor's Scurvy
allCards.description: Inflicts opponent with Scurvy, causing all enemy cards to take 20 damage per turn for 3 turns.
allCards.funFact: Enjoys hiking and sailing.

allCards.course: ICS 485: Video Game Development, ICS 486: Virtual Reality, ICS 484: Data Visualization
allCards.title: Jedi Mind Trick
allCards.description: If the opponent has a Jason Leigh card in their deck, deals 5 damage and causes the opponent to skip their turn once. If not, deals 10 damage and causes the opponent to skip their turn twice.
allCards.funFact: Wields the incredible power of the Force to open (automatic) doors without touching them.

allCards.description: Dispells all debuffs and heals all cards by 50 hp.

allCards.description: Dispells all debuffs and heals all cards to full health.
allCards.funFact: Favorite cake is tiramisu. Dislikes ketchup. To this day is still unable to whistle.
